Name: Principles of Programming
Body: A practical introduction to computers and computer programming in a high-level language.

Name: Introduction to Computer Systems
Body: An introduction to the various layers that make up a modern computer system.

Name: Mathematics for Computer Science
Body: Basic mathematical tools and methods needed for computer science.

Name: Computer Organisation
Body: The low level representation of data and algorithms in the computer.

Name: Data Communications and Security
Body: An introduction to data communications and secure communication systems.

Name: Algorithms and Data Structures
Body: An introduction to the analysis of algorithms and data structures.

Name: Discrete Structures in Mathematics and Computer Science
Body: Foundations of computer science, mathematics and logic.

Name: Object Oriented Software Development
Body: Design and implementation of object-oriented programs.

Name: Software Development Methodologies
Body: Introduction to software development processes and best practices.

Name: Computer Architecture
Body: Modern processor architectures and principles of modern processor design.

Name: Data Communications Technologies
Body: Structure of data communications and networks.

Name: Cyber Security
Body: Concepts related to software, system and network security.

Name: Applied Algorithmics
Body: Design techniques for efficient algorithmic problem-solving.
